subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The last time there was a Grand Slam men’s singles final without Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal, Novak Djokovic or Andy Murray was at the 2005 Australian Open.
snippet: The last time there was a Grand Slam men’s singles final without Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal, Novak Djokovic or Andy Murray was at the 2005 Australian Open.
